TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemCheckEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the and controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时选中的列表框中的项的选中的状态更改事件发生。The event occurs when the checked state of an item in a checked list box changes. 类指定项添加到更改，该项目，该复选框的当前值和要设置的复选框的新值的索引。The class specifies the index of the item to change, the current value of the check box for the item, and the new value to set for the check box. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查处理控件事件。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 该方法使用和属性对象来检索并计算选定的菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中一个窗体包含名为`ListView1`和名为`Textbox1`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保所有事件都都使用其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#2)]

param.span: 要更改的项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item to change.

param.name: newCheckValue
param.span: 值之一，该值指示是否将该项的复选框更改为选中、未选中或不确定。

span.span: One of the values that indicates whether to change the check box for the item to be checked, unchecked, or indeterminate.

param.name: currentValue
param.span: 值之一，该值指示当前该项的复选框是否为选中、未选中或不确定。

span.span: One of the values that indicates whether the check box for the item is currently checked, unchecked, or indeterminate.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示该项的复选框的当前状态。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the current state of the item's check box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定中的指定项的复选状态检查前状态将更改。This property enables you to determine the check state of the specified item in the before the check state change to apply is made. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查处理控件事件。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 该方法使用和属性对象来检索并计算选定的菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中一个窗体包含名为`ListView1`和名为`Textbox1`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保所有事件都都使用其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性来确定在哪一项的复选框正在更改。You can use this property to determine which item's check box in the is being changed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查处理控件事件。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 该方法使用和属性对象来检索并计算选定的菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中一个窗体包含名为`ListView1`和名为`Textbox1`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保所有事件都都使用其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::CheckState NewValue { System::Windows::Forms::CheckState get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::CheckState value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将该项的复选框设置为选中、未选中或不确定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to set the check box for the item to be checked, unchecked, or indeterminate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定指定的项的新检查状态更改的复选状态之前控件。This property enables you to determine the new check state for the specified item before the check state is changed by the control. 除了确定新的检查状态，你可以在事件处理程序中使用此属性事件的状态更改为比指定不同的复选状态。In addition to determining the new check state, you can use this property in an event handler for the event to change the state to a different check state than the one specified. 例如，如果用户位于中的项旁边的复选标记你确定不应检查基于你的应用程序的状态，您可以通过将此属性设置为其以前的设置或 t 覆盖处于选中状态更改o 不同检查状态。For example, if the user placed a check mark next to an item in the that you have determined should not be checked based on the state of your application, you can override the change in the check mark state by setting this property to its previous setting or to a different check state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`CheckedListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#156)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#156)]
